post:
Hi LET'ers,

[VortexNode LLC](http://www.vortexnode.com) has been in business since 2013 and recently became part of the [Linovus](http://www.linovus.ca) family.

We've got a second LET-only Special Offer, this time on our Shared Hosting.

This deal is for our Shared Basic option - See the packages at https://www.vortexnode.com/shared.php

5GB SSD Storage

50GB Bandwidth

Unlimited E-mail's, Subdomains, SQL etc

CloudFare, Softaculous & Let's Encrypt Included in cPanel

Location: Chicago, IL (USA)

USUAL PRICE - $2.99/month / $32.50/year

[Order Now](http://vortexnode.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

**Use Coupon: ENTRY299 - MAKES IT ONLY $2.99/YEAR!**

Got questions? You can contact us on Live Chat, through the helpdesk or give us a call.

This is a LET Exclusive Offer, you won't find it anywhere else at this price.

Alternatively, just drop me a message on here.

Cheers,

Magnus
